name: Wallace Espresso
detail: Wallace Espresso is known for pouring excellent espresso-based beverages in compact coffee shops by baristas who are as cool as they are personable.

name: Boulderz Climbing Centre
detail: Climbing gym that specializes in bouldering routes, plus classes, kids' programs & gear rentals.

name: Piri Piri Grill
detail: Restaurant with Portuguese specialties in a welcoming setting, known for its signature hot sauce.

name: Blood Brothers Brewing
detail: Beer & pub-style dishes served in a vast, industrial-chic taproom that has a patio.

name: Mattachioni
detail: Unassuming bodega offering pizza & Italian sandwiches on house-baked bread, plus salads & treats.

name: Lynx Music
detail: Lynx Music is a creative sanctuary in the heart of Toronto, conceived by artists, for artists.
